Class ObstacleEntity

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Kraken, Mine, Weather
    public abstract class ObstacleEntity
extends PhysicsObject
    An abstract class that represents obstacles, e.g the Kraken, mines or weather.

    Assessment 2

        protected Projectile createProjectile​(ProjectileData type,
                                      float rotationOffset,
                                      float dmgMul,
                                      float spdMul,
                                      com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 pos)
        Creates a new projectile fired from the entity.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of projectile to shoot
        rotationOffset - the angle to fire the projectile relative to the boat
        dmgMul - the damage multiplier
        spdMul - the speed multiplier
        pos - the position to spawn the projectile
        Returns:
        A new projectile object
